name: Pegasus 5 in 1
overview: Pegasus 5 in 1 is a collection of Camerica games, developed by Codemasters. Eventually these were officially licensed and sold for the Polish Famicom clone known as Pegasus, which used Japanese 60-pin cartridges. The games included in this cart are: Big Nose Freaks Out, Micro Machine, The Fantastic Adventures of Dizzy, Ultimate Stuntman and Big Nose The Caveman.
